alert.note: Alert for Maries; Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:03AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Maries and northeastern Phelps Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 103 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Vienna, or 15 miles north of Rolla, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. James, Belle, Vichy and Rosati. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 196 and 200. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
